title: FS: 3 diff T227's PSA / SGC graded
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: 3 diff T227's PSA / SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling the following T227's.  Condition is rough on a couple of them, but these are tough cards to find. 

Shipping is $5 if you buy one, or I'll cover shipping if you buy more than one.  PPFF preferred but happy to accept whatever method is best for you. 

Alfred de Oro (billiards) HLC back - SGC 10 - $sold
Sheppard (track & field) Miners back - SGC 20 - $35
Hilton (golf) Miners back - PSA 1 - $45
Hoppe (billiards) Miners back - PSA 1 - $45

Or take the remaining 3 for a net $110 total.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
